alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:11PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Chilton, southwestern Shelby and east central Bibb Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 410 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wilton, or over Montevallo, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Calera, Montevallo, Jemison, Wilton, University Of Montevallo, Ashby, Brierfield Ironworks Park, American Village and Minooka Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
